item.title: Large London Plane tree, its roots have made their way into the car park of No. 40 Evesham Road and are getting very close to the building. The pavement is narrowed significantly being uplifted by the base of the tree. Obstruction of view also when joining the carriageway. Regularly has shed sizeable debris into traffic., 26th March
item.description:
The tree is on the pavement outside No.40 Evesham Road. Cheltenham.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1;2, Evesham Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 26th March
item.description:
28 day with 4 way road closure needed carriageway pothole 1200x800x50mm tarmac patch required number 1 plus x7 NSD best out of hours unable to mark up properly size are approximate (CW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: It's not a question of potholes - the whole of Elmfield Road, apart from the bit that's been resurfaced at the Junction with Elmfield Avenue, is in an appaling state, and is getting worse. Can it be given priority for resurfacing along its length, please?, 26th March
item.description:
Most of Elmfield Road, apart from the junction with Elmfield Avenue. The road surface has been bad for years, and is getting worse.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Elmfield Road, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 26th March
item.description:

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 26th March
item.description:
NWD WITH GIVE AN TAKE PLEASE BRING X2 2 METER BARRIERS AND X4 SANDBAGS AND X2 FOOTWAY CLOSURE BOARDS NEEDED EITHER SIDE OF RAISED DOUBLE COVER TO MAKE SAFE (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole on approach to roundabout, 26th March
item.description:
There is a pothole on the approach to the roundabout on Blaisdon Way coming from the traffic lights. This is now quite deep and has been getting bigger over the past few weeks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole in driving line on road, 26th March
item.description:
Heading towards the Blaisdon Way traffic lights on the B4634 in the left hand line of deep delamination on the driving line there is pothole in the middle of it. It's causing a lot of debris and is a hazard for cyclists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayden Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
